title: What can Fiora's riposte block?
body:
How does Fiora's riposte work when interacting with cc over-time such as Viktor's Gravity Field or Wukong's Cyclone? Also does it nullify dots while on, or does it need to be cast as they cast the dot on you?
For example, does riposting while already ignited have any effect?

replies.body:
Wukong Cyclone it will block if you parry while he starts it, you will also ignore the knockup for the entire duration (learned that from an outplay and was rather shocked)

As for dot's if they are already on you, you will just block the damage for the duration and the dot's will continue when the parry ends, however parrying at the start will block the entire thing.

And yes you can parry Ignite AND exhaust At the start of the cast, if they are already on you the above rule applies for ignite, and you just end the duration with it still on you..

Thanks, that's awesome
Still just need to figure out Gravity Field now
if you use w 1 sec after viktor casts it and hit him w you ignore the stun and stun him instead (the cc can be transferred t anyone (eg, lux q ur w and you hit yasuo with it))

^ Basically it will block anythign for the duration, so it'll block the slow for the duration (but that's kinda useless cause you can't move while you're parrying) and if you time the parry for when the stun goes off you won't get stunned.

It will block a tick or two of ignite if you time it correctly.

It will block any and all damage that is not a tower, or fountain. I believe it also blocks most CC in the game, have yet to test it on Gravity Field or Wukongs ult.
just today i riposted a tahm kench ult right when he was about to leave. It canceled the port. Does anyone know if Fiora can cancel other non damage ults such as Taric's ultimate?
It can block Summoner spells such as Ignite or Exhaust.
it blocks everything including Exhaust if i am right. It doesn't block zhonya's though. Not sure about its interaction with bard ult.

Zhonya's is self cast and thus not from an outside source so it won't block it, Bard's ult is an outside source of CC and therefore should (I don't know if it is but by the guidelines of the skill should be) blocked.
she blocks all of everything even time
